mapper.sql: staff.staff_id as staffId, staff.user_id as userId, staff.post_id as postId, staff.induction_time as inductionTime, staff.staff_sex as staffSex, staff.staff_qq as staffQq, staff.staff_wx as staffWx, staff.staffTxdz as staffTxdz, staff.deptment_id as deptmentId, staff.staff_name staffName, birthday as birthday
mapper.insert: insert into staff (user_id, post_id, induction_time, staff_sex, staff_qq, staff_wx, staff_txdz, deptment_id,staff_name,birthday) values (#{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{post_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{induction_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{staff_sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staff_qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staff_wx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staff_txdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptment_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{staff_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{birthday,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.select:
SELECT s.*, ds.dept_son_name department_name, d.department_name dn FROM staff s LEFT JOIN deptson ds ON ds.dept_son_id = s.deptment_id LEFT JOIN department d ON d.department_id = ds.dept_id
staff_name like concat('%','${param1}','%')
and staff_id like concat('%','${param2}','%')
and ds.dept_son_id like concat('%' ,'${param3}','%')
group by s.staff_id

select s.*, u.user_name user_name, d.department_name, p.post_name post_name from staff s LEFT JOIN users u ON u.user_id=s.user_id LEFT JOIN department d ON d.department_id=s.deptment_id LEFT JOIN post p ON p.post_id=s.post_id where d.department_id=#{id}
select d.department_name departmentName,count(deptment_id) countNum from staff s LEFT JOIN department d ON d.department_id=s.deptment_id GROUP BY d.department_id
select * from users where user_name=#{name} and user_pass=#{pass}
select user_pass from users where user_name=#{name}
mapper.update: update users set user_pass=#{newPass} where user_name=#{name} and user_pass=#{pass}
mapper.select: select s.*, u.user_name,u.phone phone, d.department_name, p.post_name post_name from staff s LEFT JOIN users u ON u.user_id=s.user_id LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON ur.users_id=u.user_id LEFT JOIN role r ON ur.role_id=r.role_id LEFT JOIN department d ON d.department_id=s.deptment_id LEFT JOIN post p ON p.post_id=s.post_id where r.role_id=#{id}

SELECT s.*, ds.dept_son_name department_name, d.department_name dn FROM staff s LEFT JOIN deptson ds ON ds.dept_son_id = s.deptment_id LEFT JOIN department d ON d.department_id = ds.dept_id group by s.staff_id order by induction_time desc

select ds.dept_son_name department_name,ds.dept_son_id deptment_id,p.*,d.department_name dn from staff s LEFT JOIN deptson ds ON ds.dept_son_id = s.deptment_id LEFT JOIN department d ON d.department_id = ds.dept_id left join post p on p.post_id=s.post_id LEFT JOIN users u ON u.user_id=s.user_id where u.user_name=#{name} group by s.staff_id

select s.staff_id,s.staff_name,s.user_id from staff s left join user_role u on s.user_id=u.users_id left join app_role p on u.role_id=p.role_id left join approval v on p.app_id=v.app_id where p.role_id=#{roleId}
select staff_id from staff where user_id = #{user_id}
